Weeknote #18 [W26.05] - Attending another film festival, on interviews, and small talk
How NASA has planned to keep Artemis II astronauts safe throughout their Moon mission

There is no body in this post, just title. It still works pretty well without any change to my generator. Certain styling *markups* also work, though maybe not +all+. The URL had to be shortened since my current setup maps directory name to URL and that has certain character limitations. Multi-line text doesn't work. But I can micro-blog out basic stuff this way. Links don't behave properly too. But overall, with a little work, I can make the journal page have a mix of direct content like this, and read more content like the usual posts.
What are we doing in the name of progress?
